long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the gist of any YouTube video in just one click for free! Instantly access summaries of videos you're watching and save valuable time by learning quicker and skipping ones you don't need to watch. Powered by OpenAI's ChatGPT AI technology, 'what's the gist' gives you the summary of any YouTube video in seconds!

'What's the gist' is a useful tool for anyone looking to get a quick overview or the main points of any video in a short amount of time. Find your perfect video quickly and enjoy the show!
